thing-type.label: Feed
thing-type.description: This thing type represents a web feed.

parameter.name: URL
parameter.label: Feed URL
parameter.description: Feed URL is used to localize the feed source.

parameter.name: refresh
parameter.label: Refresh interval
parameter.description: Specifies the refresh interval in minutes. After the interval expires the bindings checks for new entries.

parameter.name: format
parameter.label: Output format
parameter.description: The output format of the feed.

parameter.name: length
parameter.label: Number of feeds stored
parameter.description: This parameter describes how many entries are stored in the channel

channel-type.label: News channel
channel-type.description: XML feed data is transfered through this channel
